Bandit_Bob.note: [[Bandit Bob]] is found in [[Worlds#D3 - Bandit Bob's Hideout|Bandit Bob's Hideout]]. His quests require you to open up the 2nd [[Smithing]] tab, unlock recipes from [[Tasks]], and open the [[Post Office]]. n

SoulCard6.note: [[Bandit Bob]] is found in [[Worlds#D3 - Bandit Bob's Hideout|Bandit Bob's Hideout]]. His quests require you to open up the 2nd [[Smithing]] tab, unlock recipes from [[Tasks]], and open the [[Post Office]]. n

poopBig.note: ''Proudly pushing out his new Poo-hD in thermo-poo-dynamics, Dr Defecaus will gladly soil the good name of Doctors everywhere with his nutty results.''nnDr Defecaus is a mini-boss that spawns in the [[Worlds#The_Office|The Office]], the portal on the bottom left of [[Worlds#Rats Nest|Rats Nest]]. It spawns once per day per account, resetting at your daily reset.nnIf you have the [[Tasks/Blunder_Hills#Merit_Shop|W1 Merit]] 'Higher chance for minibosses in world 1 to drop new Star Talents' then Dr Defecaus has a chance to drop {{Talentbook|Just Exp}} or {{Talentbook|Frothy Malk}}.n

babayaga.note: Baba Yaga is a mini-boss that spawns in the Birch Enclave, the portal on the bottom left of [[Worlds#G4_-_Valley_Of_The_Beans|Valley of the Beans]]. It spawns at the beginning of each hour (XX:00). For best results, enter the area 5 minutes before and it may take 5 minutes after the hour to spawn. nnIf you have the accuracy, you can easily beat Baba Yaga at range on both Mage and Archer classes. Climbing trees can be useful to evade Baba Yaga if it gets too close. Warriors will have to be more careful about getting stepped on.nnBaba Yaga also appears in the 15th wave of the [[Colosseum#Dewdrop_Colosseum|Dewdrop Colosseum]].nnIf you have the [[Tasks/Blunder_Hills#Merit_Shop|W1 Merit]] 'Higher chance for minibosses in world 1 to drop new Star Talents' then Baba Yaga has a chance to drop {{Talentbook|Just Exp}} or {{Talentbook|Frothy Malk}}.n

babaHour.note: To summon this boss, you must craft {{CraftReq|Googley Eyes}} using the recipe dropped from [[Crabcake|Crabcakes]].n{{ForgeSlotn|anvtab=Anvil Tab 2n|craftnum=42n|levelreq=17n|resource1=Woodular Circle|quantity1=2n|resource2=Distilled Water|quantity2=5n|resource3=Capitalist Case|quantity3=1n|recipefrom=[[Crabcake]]n|cargo=n

babaMummy.note: To summon this boss, you must craft the {{CraftReq|Dootjat Eye}} using the recipe dropped from [[Sand Giant|Sand Giants]]. n{{ForgeSlotn|anvtab=Anvil Tab 2n|craftnum=59n|levelreq=21n|resource1=Silver Antiquen|quantity1= 1n|resource2=Gold Barn|quantity2= 80n|resource3=Ghostn|quantity3= 1n|recipefrom=[[Sand Giant]]n|cargo=n

xmasEvent.note: '''Every day during Giftmas, you'll get to give ME gifts!! Hey dont gimme dat look! Not every event needs to be centered around you, ya know!'''nnThe [[Giftmas Blobulyte]] was a blobulyte available during the [[Events#Christmas_Event|Christmas Event]] (December 29th 2020 to January 22nd 2021). Its daily quests awarded players {{CraftReq|Giftmas Box}} in exchange for [[Ghost (Event)|Ghost]] kills and rare/expensive items.n

loveEvent.note: '''Roses are red, blobulytes are cute, go run my errands and I'll give you some loot!'''nnThe [[Loveulyte]] was a blobulyte available during the [[Events#Valenslimes_Day|Valentines Event]] (February 24th 2021 to March 8th 2021). Its daily quests awarded players {{CraftReq|Choco Box}} in exchange for {{CraftReq|Lovey Dovey Letter}} and [[Valentslime]] kills.n

EasterEvent1.note: '''Im Eg,' 'I'm Egg,' 'I'm... wait which one am I again?'''nnThe [[Egggulyte]] were a trio of blobulytes available during the [[Events#Easter_Event|Easter Event]] (April 8th 2021 to April 20th 2021). Their daily quests awarded players {{CraftReq|Egg Capsule}} for finding {{CraftReq|Egg Capsule}} and {{CraftReq|Goldegg Capsule}}.n

SummerEvent1.note: '''Cmon bro go get yourself some of that summer action!! I wanna see you opening those coolers like no other!'''nnThe [[Coastiolyte]] is a blobulyte available during the [[Events#Summer Break|Summer Break Event]] (June 26th 2021 until July 18th 2021). Its daily quests award players {{CraftReq|Summer Cooler}} and {{CraftReq|Beach Oyster}} in exchange for finding {{CraftReq|Summer Cooler}} or killing [[Plasti Doug]] and [[Mr Blueberry]].n

ghost.note: Ghosts had a chance to spawn during the [[Events|Giftmas 2020 Event]]. nnIf auto is off and you are manually clicking and killing monsters, the chance for a Ghost spawn on enemy kill is 1 in 45.nnIf auto is on and you are automatically killing monsters, the chance for a Ghost spawn on enemy kill is 1 in 60.nnThe stats are 10x HP, 20x EXP, 1.8x damage as the area it spawns in. n
